trans-unit.source: Passes message information to the specified window procedure

seg-source.mrk: Passes message information to the specified window procedure

target.mrk: Passes message information to the specified window procedure

trans-unit.source: The address of a previous window procedure, or a special internal value meaningful only to _WinAPI_CallWindowProcW() function.

seg-source.mrk: The address of a previous window procedure, or a special internal value meaningful only to _WinAPI_CallWindowProcW() function.

target.mrk: The address of a previous window procedure, or a special internal value meaningful only to _WinAPI_CallWindowProcW() function.

trans-unit.source: A handle to the window procedure that received the message.

seg-source.mrk: A handle to the window procedure that received the message.

target.mrk: A handle to the window procedure that received the message.

trans-unit.source: Additional message-specific information. The content of this parameter depends on the message.

seg-source.mrk: The content of this parameter depends on the message.

target.mrk: The content of this parameter depends on the message.

trans-unit.source: Additional message-specific information. The content of this parameter depends on the message.

seg-source.mrk: The content of this parameter depends on the message.

target.mrk: The content of this parameter depends on the message.

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of the message processing and depends on the message sent.

seg-source.mrk: Returns the result of the message processing and depends on the message sent.

target.mrk: Returns the result of the message processing and depends on the message sent.

trans-unit.source: Use this function for window subclassing. Usually, all windows with the same class share one window procedure.

seg-source.mrk: Use this function for window subclassing.
Usually, all windows with the same class share one window procedure.

target.mrk: Use this function for window subclassing.
Usually, all windows with the same class share one window procedure.

trans-unit.source: A subclass is a window or set of windows with the same class whose messages are intercepted and processed by another window procedure (or procedures) before being passed to the window procedure of the class.

seg-source.mrk: A subclass is a window or set of windows with the same class whose messages are intercepted and processed by another window procedure (or procedures) before being passed to the window procedure of the class.

target.mrk: A subclass is a window or set of windows with the same class whose messages are intercepted and processed by another window procedure (or procedures) before being passed to the window procedure of the class.

trans-unit.source: You cannot take advantage of this conversion if you call the window procedure directly.

seg-source.mrk: You cannot take advantage of this conversion if you call the window procedure directly.

target.mrk: You cannot take advantage of this conversion if you call the window procedure directly.
